meanings.definition: A salt or ester of xanthic acid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the xanthates in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The xanthates were used in the production of rubber.
meanings.sent3: The xanthates threw a party in the beaker, celebrating their chemical bond.
meanings.sent4: The xanthates linked together like old friends reuniting after years apart.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the xanthates made them stand out in the mixture.

meanings.definition: A compound containing a xanthate group.
meanings.sent1: She analyzed the structure of the xanthates under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The xanthates reacted with the other chemicals in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The xanthates in the test tube whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The xanthates acted as the key players in the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of the xanthates filled the laboratory.
